properties.name: imagePath
properties.description: Specifies the URL of an image.This attribute is useful only for images.

properties.name: imageClass
properties.description: Material icon class name.Material Example:imageClass='material-icons' mdbClass='cloud' Fontawesome Example:imageClass='fa fa-address-book fa-lg'

properties.name: mdbClass
properties.description: This attribute is useful for only material icons.Material Example:mdbClass='cloud'
